headline: The S&P 500’s new record high comes with a very costly catch for investors
summary: History has shown that when stock valuations rise this far into the stratosphere, they eventually come back to earth.

raw.headline: The S&P 500’s new record high comes with a very costly catch for investors
raw.summary: History has shown that when stock valuations rise this far into the stratosphere, they eventually come back to earth.

headline: Ascot Announces Upgraded S&P Global Ratings and A Rating for Core Operating Entity
summary: Ascot Group Limited ("Ascot"), a global specialty (re)insurance company, today announced that S&P Global Ratings ("S&P") has raised its long-term issuer credit rating for Ascot to BBB+ from BBB on its strengthened capital position. S&P has also assigned an A long-term financial strength rating to Ascot's core operating entity, Ascot Bermuda Limited.

raw.headline: Ascot Announces Upgraded S&P Global Ratings and A Rating for Core Operating Entity
raw.summary: Ascot Group Limited ("Ascot"), a global specialty (re)insurance company, today announced that S&P Global Ratings ("S&P") has raised its long-term issuer credit rating for Ascot to BBB+ from BBB on its strengthened capital position. S&P has also assigned an A long-term financial strength rating to Ascot's core operating entity, Ascot Bermuda Limited.

headline: Platts, CME Group Announce Screen-based Price Assessment Tool for Aluminum Midwest Premium
summary: Platts, part of S&P Global Commodity Insights, the leading independent provider of information, data, analysis, benchmark prices and workflow solutions for the commodities markets, and CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, are collaborating to bring increased transparency to the US spot physical aluminum market through PlattsView, an online, direct-entry communications tool to be used in the Platts Market-On-Close (MOC) price assessment process for the US Aluminum P1020 Midwest

headline: Automotive Brand Loyalty Rates Show Mixed Results, according to S&P Global Mobility
summary: Industry brand loyalty rates declined slightly in the first half of 2025 following last year's rebound, according to a new S&P Global Mobility analysis of new vehicle registration data through June.

raw.headline: Automotive Brand Loyalty Rates Show Mixed Results, according to S&P Global Mobility
